summary: Software engineer with 6+ years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in React, Node.js, and serverless architectures. Passionate about creating scalable, maintainable software solutions that provide exceptional user experiences.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description: Lead engineer for the company's flagship product, a SaaS platform serving enterprise clients.
achievements: Architected and implemented a microservices-based backend that improved system reliability by 35%.
Led migration from a monolithic architecture to a more scalable, distributed system using AWS Lambda and API Gateway.
Mentored junior developers and established code quality standards that reduced bug reports by 40%.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Worked on multiple client projects across various industries, focusing on modern web applications.
achievements: Developed an e-commerce platform that increased client's online sales by 150% within six months.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines that reduced deployment times by 70%.
Optimized database queries resulting in a 45% performance improvement on high-traffic pages.

promotions.title: Senior Developer
achievements: Led a team of 5 developers on a major client project.
Introduced automated testing practices that improved code coverage from 30% to 85%.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Focused on creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces for web applications.
achievements: Developed a component library that was used across multiple client projects, reducing development time by 30%.
Implemented accessibility improvements that helped clients meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to translate mockups into functional interfaces.

education.description: Coursework included Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, and Software Engineering. Active member of the Computer Science Club.
